unnormalised: Arre yaar, weather's always messing with the crops! Remember 20/07/2023, the rains in Maharashtra? Poor farmers! Yields are totally weather-dependent. My uncle in Punjab says even the best PUSA basmati is affected. It's like waiting for Lakshmi to smile, but you can't predict it, right? Heard the IIT-Delhi folks are working on it. Hope they crack it before the next monsoon season around 05:30 PM on 10/06/2024. Need a good harvest for Diwali on 01/11/2024!
normalised: Arre yaar, weather's always messing with the crops! Remember twentieth july two thousand and twenty three, the rains in Maharashtra? Poor farmers! Yields are totally weather-dependent. My uncle in Punjab says even the best P U S A basmati is affected. It's like waiting for Lakshmi to smile, but you can't predict it, right? Heard the I I T-Delhi folks are working on it. Hope they crack it before the next monsoon season around five thirty P M on tenth june two thousand and twenty four. Need a good harvest for Diwali on first november two thousand and twenty four!
